00057 typedef enum TPVLoopbackMode
00058 {
00059     PV_LOOPBACK_NONE,
00060     PV_LOOPBACK_COMM, /* Loops back from Comm source to Comm sink */
00061     PV_LOOPBACK_ENGINE, /* Loops back media at the engine level, no mux involved */
00062     PV_LOOPBACK_MUX /* Loops back at the output of the mux */
00063 } PV2WayLoopbackMode;
